data.title: Warren Buffett's bet on Barrick boosts gold ETFs. What to watch in the soaring space
data.text: Gold ETFs are having a strong year that could get even stronger, two ETF analysts say.

data.title: Likely Reasons Why Warren Buffett Bought Barrick Gold
data.text: What was most surprising in Berkshire's latest Form 13F was the new position in Barrick Gold, as Buffett bought more than $500 million worth of GOLD in Q2.

data.title: Is Buffett Selling Banks, Buying Gold A Warning Sign For Investors?
data.text: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (NYSE: BRK-A) (NYSE: BRK-B) CEO Warren Buffett has always been a huge fan of bank stocks and a vocal critic of gold.

data.title: Warren Buffett's Shocking New Investment
data.text: Here's what Buffett just bought and what you should know about it.
